58 For the sake of the family, the individual should put his personal interests second. 63 When a mother-in-law and a daughter-in-law come into conflict, even if the mother-in-law is in the wrong, the husband should still persuade his wife to obey his mother.
58 For the sake of the family, the individual should put his personal interests second. 64 Being a student, one should not question the authority of their teacher.
58 For the sake of the family, the individual should put his personal interests second. 65 In a group, we should avoid open quarrel to preserve the harmony of the group.
58 For the sake of the family, the individual should put his personal interests second. 66 Even if there is some disagreement with others, one should avoid the conflict.
58 For the sake of the family, the individual should put his personal interests second. 67 A person should not insist on his own opinion if his co-workers disagree with him.
58 For the sake of the family, the individual should put his personal interests second. 69 If one could have only one child, it is more preferable to have a boy than a girl.
se9c_3 Extended application. Elite vs. Mass
